'''Activated・Canned Knowledge''' is a quest item gained from progressing through the [[Archon Quest]] [[Chapter III]]: Act I quest, "[[Ever So Close]]".

Using this item will permanently increase the [[Traveler]]'s Base ATK by '''3'''.
